infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FitQuest needs location access to show your current position and track your fitness activities.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: FitQuest needs access to your health data to track your fitness progress and calculate your character's experience points.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: FitQuest needs to update your health data to record your fitness achievements and workouts.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: FitQuest uses motion data to track your steps and physical activities for character progression.
